static char __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_2fwd_bkwd_fast[] = "Takes emission and transition probabilities, and calculates posteriors.\n    Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)\n    Input:\n    e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)\n    t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)\n    in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)\n    full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)\n    else only return post\n    output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.\n    Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned";

 0062:     """Takes emission and transition probabilities, and calculates posteriors.
 0063:     Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)
 0064:     Input:

 0067:     in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)
 0068:     full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)
 0069:     else only return post
 0070:     output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.
 0071:     Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned"""

static char __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_4fwd_bkwd_lowmem[] = "Takes emission and transition probabilities, and calculates posteriors.\n    Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)\n    Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior. Use temporary\n    Arrays for saving. Input:\n    e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)\n    t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)\n    in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)\n    full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)\n    else only return post\n    output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.\n    Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned";

 0179:     """Takes emission and transition probabilities, and calculates posteriors.
 0180:     Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)
 0181:     Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior. Use temporary
 0182:     Arrays for saving. Input:
 0183:     e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)
 0184:     t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)
 0185:     in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)
 0186:     full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)
 0187:     else only return post
 0188:     output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.
 0189:     Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned"""
+0190:     cdef int n_states = e_mat.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_n_states = (__pyx_v_e_mat.shape[0]);

+0191:     cdef int n_loci = e_mat.shape[1]
  __pyx_v_n_loci = (__pyx_v_e_mat.shape[1]);

 0192:     cdef Py_ssize_t i, j, k    # The Array Indices
 0193:     cdef double stay           # The Probablility of Staying
 0194:     cdef double tot_ll  # The total Likelihood (need for Posterior)
 0195: 
 0196:     # Do transform to Log Space:
+0197:     cdef double[:,:,:] t0 = np.log(t_mat)
  __Pyx_GetModuleGlobalName(__pyx_t_2, __pyx_n_s_np); if (unlikely(!__pyx_t_2)) __PYX_ERR(0, 197, __pyx_L1_error)
  __Pyx_GOTREF(__pyx_t_2);
  __pyx_t_3 = __Pyx_PyObject_GetAttrStr(__pyx_t_2, __pyx_n_s_log); if (unlikely(!__pyx_t_3)) __PYX_ERR(0, 197, __pyx_L1_error)
  __Pyx_GOTREF(__pyx_t_3);
  __Pyx_DECREF(__pyx_t_2); __pyx_t_2 = 0;
  __pyx_t_2 = __pyx_memoryview_fromslice(__pyx_v_t_mat, 3, (PyObject *(*)(char *)) __pyx_memview_get_double, (int (*)(char *, PyObject *)) __pyx_memview_set_double, 0);; if (unlikely(!__pyx_t_2)) __PYX_ERR(0, 197, __pyx_L1_error)
  __Pyx_GOTREF(__pyx_t_2);
  __pyx_t_4 = NULL;
  if (CYTHON_UNPACK_METHODS && unlikely(PyMethod_Check(__pyx_t_3))) {
    __pyx_t_4 = PyMethod_GET_SELF(__pyx_t_3);
    if (likely(__pyx_t_4)) {
      PyObject* function = PyMethod_GET_FUNCTION(__pyx_t_3);
      __Pyx_INCREF(__pyx_t_4);
      __Pyx_INCREF(function);
      __Pyx_DECREF_SET(__pyx_t_3, function);
    }
  }

+0316: def fwd_bkwd_scaled(double[:, :] e_mat, double[:, :, :] t_mat,
/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_7fwd_bkwd_scaled(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds); /*proto*/
static char __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_6fwd_bkwd_scaled[] = "\n    Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)\n    Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE\n    Saves and returns full posterior (WARNING: Need 3x as much memory as low mem version)\n    arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.\n    e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)\n    t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)\n    in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)\n    full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)\n    else only return post\n    output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.\n    Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned\n    ";
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_8hapsburg_5cfunc_7fwd_bkwd_scaled = {"fwd_bkwd_scaled", (PyCFunction)(void*)(PyCFunctionWithKeywords)__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_7fwd_bkwd_scaled, METH_VARARGS|METH_KEYWORDS, __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_6fwd_bkwd_scaled};
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_7fwd_bkwd_scaled(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds) {
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_e_mat = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_t_mat = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  double __pyx_v_in_val;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_full = 0;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_output = 0;
  PyObject *__pyx_r = 0;
  __Pyx_RefNannyDeclarations
  __Pyx_RefNannySetupContext("fwd_bkwd_scaled (wrapper)", 0);
  {
    static PyObject **__pyx_pyargnames[] = {&__pyx_n_s_e_mat,&__pyx_n_s_t_mat,&__pyx_n_s_in_val,&__pyx_n_s_full,&__pyx_n_s_output,0};
    PyObject* values[5] = {0,0,0,0,0};
/* … */
  /* function exit code */
  __Pyx_RefNannyFinishContext();
  return __pyx_r;
}

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_8hapsburg_5cfunc_6fwd_bkwd_scaled(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_e_mat, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_t_mat, double __pyx_v_in_val, PyObject *__pyx_v_full, PyObject *__pyx_v_output) {

 0318:     """
 0319:     Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)
 0320:     Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE
 0321:     Saves and returns full posterior (WARNING: Need 3x as much memory as low mem version)
 0322:     arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.
 0323:     e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)
 0324:     t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)
 0325:     in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)
 0326:     full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)
 0327:     else only return post
 0328:     output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.
 0329:     Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned
 0330:     """
+0331:     cdef int n_states = e_mat.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_n_states = (__pyx_v_e_mat.shape[0]);

+0332:     cdef int n_loci = e_mat.shape[1]
  __pyx_v_n_loci = (__pyx_v_e_mat.shape[1]);

/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_9fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds); /*proto*/
static char __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_8fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem[] = "\n    Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)\n    Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE\n    Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior but use temporary\n    arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.\n    e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)\n    t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)\n    in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)\n    full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)\n    else only return post\n    output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.\n    Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned\n    ";

 0438:     """
 0439:     Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)
 0440:     Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE
 0441:     Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior but use temporary
 0442:     arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.
 0443:     e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)
 0444:     t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)
 0445:     in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)
 0446:     full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)
 0447:     else only return post
 0448:     output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.
 0449:     Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned
 0450:     """

 0635:   # compute binomial pmf, for each p_derived_read
 0636:   cdef double p_binom_00, p_binom_01, p_binom_11
 0637:   cdef double p_derived_read_00, p_derived_read_01, p_derived_read_11
+0638:   p_derived_read_00 = e_rate_read
  __pyx_v_p_derived_read_00 = __pyx_v_e_rate_read;

+0639:   p_derived_read_01 = 0.5
  __pyx_v_p_derived_read_01 = 0.5;

+0640:   p_derived_read_11 = 1 - e_rate_read
  __pyx_v_p_derived_read_11 = (1.0 - __pyx_v_e_rate_read);

+0641:   p_binom_00 = binom_coef*p_derived_read_00**rc_alt*(1 - p_derived_read_00)**(rc_ref)
  __pyx_v_p_binom_00 = ((__pyx_v_binom_coef * pow(__pyx_v_p_derived_read_00, ((double)__pyx_v_rc_alt))) * pow((1.0 - __pyx_v_p_derived_read_00), ((double)__pyx_v_rc_ref)));

+0642:   p_binom_01 = binom_coef*p_derived_read_01**rc_alt*(1 - p_derived_read_01)**(rc_ref)
  __pyx_v_p_binom_01 = ((__pyx_v_binom_coef * pow(__pyx_v_p_derived_read_01, ((double)__pyx_v_rc_alt))) * pow((1.0 - __pyx_v_p_derived_read_01), ((double)__pyx_v_rc_ref)));

+0643:   p_binom_11 = binom_coef*p_derived_read_11**rc_alt*(1 - p_derived_read_11)**(rc_ref)
  __pyx_v_p_binom_11 = ((__pyx_v_binom_coef * pow(__pyx_v_p_derived_read_11, ((double)__pyx_v_rc_alt))) * pow((1.0 - __pyx_v_p_derived_read_11), ((double)__pyx_v_rc_ref)));

+0644:   return prob_genotype[0]*p_binom_00 + prob_genotype[1]*p_binom_01 + prob_genotype[2]*p_binom_11
  __Pyx_XDECREF(__pyx_r);
  __pyx_t_1 = 0;
  __pyx_t_2 = 1;
  __pyx_t_3 = 2;
  __pyx_t_4 = PyFloat_FromDouble(((((*((double *) ( /* dim=0 */ (__pyx_v_prob_genotype.data + __pyx_t_1 * __pyx_v_prob_genotype.strides[0]) ))) * __pyx_v_p_binom_00) + ((*((double *) ( /* dim=0 */ (__pyx_v_prob_genotype.data + __pyx_t_2 * __pyx_v_prob_genotype.strides[0]) ))) * __pyx_v_p_binom_01)) + ((*((double *) ( /* dim=0 */ (__pyx_v_prob_genotype.data + __pyx_t_3 * __pyx_v_prob_genotype.strides[0]) ))) * __pyx_v_p_binom_11))); if (unlikely(!__pyx_t_4)) __PYX_ERR(0, 644, __pyx_L1_error)

+0650: cdef inline extract_reference_allele(np.ndarray[np.uint8_t, ndim=2] refhap, int row, int col, int blocksize):

+0719: def fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_onTheFly_rc(double[:, :, :] t_mat,
/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_21fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_onTheFly_rc(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds); /*proto*/
static char __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_20fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_onTheFly_rc[] = "\n    Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)\n    Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE\n    Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior but use temporary\n    arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.\n    e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)\n    t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)\n    refhap: Reference Haplotype. 0/1 stored in groups of 8 in unsigned char (aka. one bit per allele ) [k x l/8]\n    rc: read count, stored as unsigned char (range 0-255): [2 x l]\n    in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)\n    full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)\n    else only return post\n    output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.\n    Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned\n    ";
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_8hapsburg_5cfunc_21fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_onTheFly_rc = {"fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_onTheFly_rc", (PyCFunction)(void*)(PyCFunctionWithKeywords)__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_21fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_onTheFly_rc, METH_VARARGS|METH_KEYWORDS, __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_20fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_onTheFly_rc};

 0722:     """
 0723:     Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)
 0724:     Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE
 0725:     Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior but use temporary
 0726:     arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.
 0727:     e_mat: Emission probabilities: [k x l]  (normal space)
 0728:     t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)
 0729:     refhap: Reference Haplotype. 0/1 stored in groups of 8 in unsigned char (aka. one bit per allele ) [k x l/8]
 0730:     rc: read count, stored as unsigned char (range 0-255): [2 x l]
 0731:     in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)
 0732:     full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)
 0733:     else only return post
 0734:     output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.
 0735:     Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned
 0736:     """
+0737:     cdef int n_states = 1 + refhap.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_n_states = (1 + (__pyx_v_refhap->dimensions[0]));

+0738:     cdef int n_loci = t_mat.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_n_loci = (__pyx_v_t_mat.shape[0]);

 0739:     cdef Py_ssize_t i, j, k    # The Array and Iteration Indices
 0740:     cdef double stay           # The Probablility of Staying
 0741:     cdef double x1, x2, x3     # Place holder variables [make code readable]
 0742:

 0886: @cython.profile(True)
+0887: def fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef(double[:, :, :] t_mat,
/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_23fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds); /*proto*/
static char __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_22fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef[] = "\n    Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)\n    Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE\n    Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior but use temporary\n    arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.\n    e_mat: Emission probabilities: [3 x l]  (normal space)\n    t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)\n    refhap: Reference Haplotype. 0/1 stored in groups of 8 in unsigned char (aka. one bit per allele ) [k x l/8]\n    in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)\n    full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)\n    else only return post\n    output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.\n    Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned\n    ";
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_8hapsburg_5cfunc_23fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef = {"fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef", (PyCFunction)(void*)(PyCFunctionWithKeywords)__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_23fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef, METH_VARARGS|METH_KEYWORDS, __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_22fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef};

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_8hapsburg_5cfunc_22fwd_bkwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_t_mat, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_refhap, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_e_mat, CYTHON_UNUSED int __pyx_v_overhang, double __pyx_v_in_val, int __pyx_v_blocksize, PyObject *__pyx_v_full, PyObject *__pyx_v_output) {
  int __pyx_v_n_states;
  int __pyx_v_n_loci;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_i;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_j;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_k;
  double __pyx_v_stay;
  double __pyx_v_x1;
  double __pyx_v_x2;
  double __pyx_v_x3;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_post = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_post_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  PyObject *__pyx_v_temp = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_temp_v = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  PyObject *__pyx_v_temp1 = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_temp1_v = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_t = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  PyObject *__pyx_v_c = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_c_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  PyObject *__pyx_v_fwd0 = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_fwd = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  PyObject *__pyx_v_bwd0 = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_bwd = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  PyObject *__pyx_v_tmp0 = NULL;

 0890:     """
 0891:     Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)
 0892:     Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE
 0893:     Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior but use temporary
 0894:     arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.
 0895:     e_mat: Emission probabilities: [3 x l]  (normal space)
 0896:     t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)
 0897:     refhap: Reference Haplotype. 0/1 stored in groups of 8 in unsigned char (aka. one bit per allele ) [k x l/8]
 0898:     in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)
 0899:     full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)
 0900:     else only return post
 0901:     output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.
 0902:     Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned
 0903:     """
+0904:     cdef int n_states = 1 + refhap.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_n_states = (1 + (__pyx_v_refhap->dimensions[0]));

+0905:     cdef int n_loci = t_mat.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_n_loci = (__pyx_v_t_mat.shape[0]);

+1027: def fwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef(double[:, :, :] t_mat,
/* Python wrapper */
static PyObject *__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_25fwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef(PyObject *__pyx_self, PyObject *__pyx_args, PyObject *__pyx_kwds); /*proto*/
static char __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_24fwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef[] = "\n    Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)\n    Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE\n    Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior but use temporary\n    arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.\n    e_mat: Emission probabilities: [3 x l]  (normal space)\n    t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)\n    refhap: Reference Haplotype. 0/1 stored in groups of 8 in unsigned char (aka. one bit per allele ) [k x l/8]\n    in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)\n    full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)\n    else only return post\n    output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.\n    Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned\n    ";
static PyMethodDef __pyx_mdef_8hapsburg_5cfunc_25fwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef = {"fwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef", (PyCFunction)(void*)(PyCFunctionWithKeywords)__pyx_pw_8hapsburg_5cfunc_25fwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef, METH_VARARGS|METH_KEYWORDS, __pyx_doc_8hapsburg_5cfunc_24fwd_scaled_lowmem_binaryRef};

 1030:     """
 1031:     Uses speed-up specific for Genotype data (pooling same transition rates)
 1032:     Uses rescaling of fwd and bwd calculations - NOT LOGSPACE
 1033:     Low-Mem: Do no save the full FWD BWD and Posterior but use temporary
 1034:     arrays for saving only last vectors. Saves only 0-state posterior long term.
 1035:     e_mat: Emission probabilities: [3 x l]  (normal space)
 1036:     t_mat: Transition Matrix:  [l x 3 x 3]  (normal space)
 1037:     refhap: Reference Haplotype. 0/1 stored in groups of 8 in unsigned char (aka. one bit per allele ) [k x l/8]
 1038:     in_val: Intitial probability of single symmetric state (normal space)
 1039:     full: Boolean whether to return (post, fwd1, bwd1, tot_ll)
 1040:     else only return post
 1041:     output: Whether to print output useful for monitoring.
 1042:     Otherwise only posterior mat [kxl] of post is returned
 1043:     """
+1044:     cdef int n_states = 1 + refhap.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_n_states = (1 + (__pyx_v_refhap->dimensions[0]));

+1045:     cdef int n_loci = t_mat.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_n_loci = (__pyx_v_t_mat.shape[0]);

  __pyx_r = __pyx_t_4;
  __pyx_t_4 = 0;
  goto __pyx_L0;
